rules: Rule1: If the device uses Zigbee control technology, then whenever the device is not operational, it regulates the temperature in the region.
Rule2: Either the region has extreme weather conditions, or the device uses WiFi control technology, or the device uses Zigbee control technology.
Rule3: Assuming the device has plastic housing material, then if the region has extreme weather conditions, the region has power outage conditions.
Rule4: If the region has smart grid infrastructure, then the region has power for the smart home.
Rule5: Provided that the region has fiber optic infrastructure, the region has smart grid infrastructure.
Rule6: In case the region has high humidity conditions, the region has moisture damage conditions.
Rule7: Provided that the region has corrosion risk conditions, the device is not installed as a faulty thermostat.
Rule8: Whenever the region has moisture damage conditions, the region has corrosion risk conditions.
Rule9: If the device regulates backup temperature, then the device regulates the temperature in the region.
Rule10: Assuming the device uses Bluetooth control technology, then whenever the device is not operational, it regulates backup temperature.
Rule11: Either the device uses Bluetooth control technology or the device uses infrared control technology.
Rule12: Provided that the device uses infrared control technology, then if the device is not operational, it regulates backup temperature.
Rule13: Either the device has neural network technology or the device has deep learning technology.
Rule14: Whenever the device has deep learning technology, then if the device has AI algorithm technology, then provided that the device has metal components material, the device is operational.
Rule15: Assuming the device has reinforcement learning technology, then if the device has neural network technology, the device has machine learning technology.
Rule16: Either the device has reinforcement learning technology or the device has supervised learning technology.
Rule17: In case the device has supervised learning technology, the device has unsupervised learning technology.
Rule18: Whenever the device has unsupervised learning technology, then if the device has neural network technology, the device has machine learning technology.
Rule19: If the device is active as a thermostat, then the device is operational.
Rule20: Provided that the device is installed as a smart thermostat, the device is active as a thermostat.
Rule21: Either the device is installed as a smart thermostat or the device is installed as a basic thermostat.
Rule22: Assuming the device is installed as a basic thermostat, the device is active as a thermostat.
Rule23: In case the device regulates the temperature in the region, the device maintains a comfortable temperature.
Rule24: Whenever the device uses WiFi control technology, then if the device is not operational, it regulates the temperature in the region.

Rule25: If it is not the case that either the device has machine learning technology or if the device has AI algorithm technology then provided that the device has metal components material the device is operational, then the device has rule-based technology.

Rule26: Provided that it is not the case that either the device has machine learning technology or if the device has AI algorithm technology then assuming the device has metal components material the device is operational, then it is not the case that the device has rule-based technology.
Rule27: In case it is not true that if the region has renewable energy then the region has power for the smart home, then the region has fossil fuel energy.
Rule28: Whenever it is not the case that if the region has renewable energy then the region has power for the smart home, then the region does not have fossil fuel energy.
Rule29: Assuming the device is not active as a thermostat, the device is installed as a faulty thermostat.
Rule30: Provided that the device is not active as a thermostat, the region has high humidity conditions.
Rule31: Provided that the device is not operational, the region has fiber optic infrastructure.
Rule32: Assuming the device is not operational, the region has renewable energy.
Rule33: Provided that the device is not operational, it is not the case that the device maintains a comfortable temperature.
facts: Fact1: The device has plastic housing material.
Fact2: The device has metal components material.
Fact3: The device has AI algorithm technology.
Fact4: It is not the case that the region has power for the smart home.
Fact5: It is not the case that the region has power outage conditions.
Fact6: It is not the case that the device has machine learning technology.
